lead_paragraph: A judge set bail at $5 million each for the two men accused of tying up and robbing Knicks forward Eddy Curry at his suburban Chicago home.Demorris Hill, 25, and Antoine Larkins, 28, each of Chicago, are also charged in the armed robbery of Miami Heat forward Antoine Walker during a home invasion at the player’s Chicago town house.
